这个错误表明 Maven 无法从阿里云镜像仓库 (`alimaven`) 下载 `langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient:1.3.0-beta9` 依赖包。以下是解决方案：
---
### **1. 检查依赖是否存在** 首先确认该版本是否在 Maven 中央仓库存在： - 访问 [Maven Central](https://search.maven.org/) 搜索 `dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient` - 如果 `1.3.0-beta9` 不存在，可能是拼写错误或未发布版本
---
### **2. 强制更新 Maven 本地缓存** ```bash # 强制重新下载依赖（忽略缓存） mvn clean install -U
# 如果仍失败，手动删除本地缓存 rm -rf ~/.m2/repository/dev/langchain4j/ ```
---
### **3. 更换 Maven 镜像源** 在 `pom.xml` 或 `settings.xml` 中添加官方仓库： ```xml <repositories> <repository> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/</url> </repository> </repositories> ```
或修改 `settings.xml`（位于 `~/.m2/settings.xml`）： ```xml <mirrors> <mirror> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/</url> <mirrorOf>central</mirrorOf> </mirror> </mirrors> ```
---
### **4. 使用正确的依赖版本** 如果 `beta9` 不存在，尝试： ```xml <!-- 检查最新版本 --> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient</artifactId> <version>1.3.0</version> <!-- 或最新稳定版 --> </dependency> ```
---
### **5. 检查网络问题** - 确保能访问 Maven 中央仓库： ```bash curl -I https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/ ``` - 如果是公司内网，可能需要配置代理： ```bash export MAVEN_OPTS="-Dhttps.proxyHost=your.proxy.com -Dhttps.proxyPort=8080" ```
---
### **6. 手动安装依赖（终极方案）** 如果依赖确实不在仓库中： 1. 从 [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/langchain4j/langchain4j/releases) 下载 JAR 文件 2. 手动安装到本地仓库： ```bash mvn install:install-file \ -Dfile=langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient-1.3.0-beta9.jar \ -DgroupId=dev.langchain4j \ -DartifactId=langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient \ -Dversion=1.3.0-beta9 \ -Dpackaging=jar ```
---
### **总结步骤** 1. 先运行 `mvn clean install -U` 2. 检查版本是否存在 3. 更换镜像源或使用稳定版本 4. 最后考虑手动安装
如果问题依旧，请提供： - 完整的 `pom.xml` - 执行 `mvn --version` 的输出

这个错误表明 Maven 无法从阿里云镜像仓库 (`alimaven`) 下载 `langchain4j-bom:1.3.0-beta9`（BOM 文件）。以下是详细的解决方案：
---
### **1. 检查版本是否存在** 首先确认该版本是否在 Maven 中央仓库： - 访问 [Maven Central](https://search.maven.org/artifact/dev.langchain4j/langchain4j-bom) 搜索 `langchain4j-bom` - `1.3.0-beta9` 可能是一个**不存在的快照版本**（截至2024年7月，最新稳定版是 `1.0.0`）
---
### **2. 强制更新 Maven 本地缓存** ```bash # 强制重新下载依赖（忽略缓存） mvn clean install -U
# 如果仍失败，手动删除本地缓存 rm -rf ~/.m2/repository/dev/langchain4j/langchain4j-bom/ ```
---
### **3. 更换 Maven 镜像源** 阿里云镜像可能未同步该 BOM 文件。在 `pom.xml` 或 `settings.xml` 中添加官方仓库： ```xml <repositories> <repository> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/</url> </repository> </repositories> ```
或在 `~/.m2/settings.xml` 中覆盖镜像： ```xml <mirrors> <mirror> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/</url> <mirrorOf>central</mirrorOf> </mirror> </mirrors> ```
---
### **4. 使用正确的 BOM 版本** 检查 [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/langchain4j/langchain4j/releases) 确认可用版本。例如： ```xml <!-- 使用稳定版 --> <dependencyManagement> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-bom</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> <!-- 替换为实际版本 --> <type>pom</type> <scope>import</scope> </dependency> </dependencies> </dependencyManagement> ```
---
### **5. 检查依赖声明** 确保 BOM 文件正确导入（需放在 `<dependencyManagement>` 中）： ```xml <project> ... <dependencyManagement> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-bom</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> <type>pom</type> <scope>import</scope> </dependency> </dependencies> </dependencyManagement> <dependencies> <!-- 其他依赖 --> </dependencies> </project> ```
---
### **6. 手动安装 BOM（终极方案）** 如果版本确实存在但无法下载： 1. 从 [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/langchain4j/langchain4j/releases) 下载 BOM 的 `.pom` 文件 2. 手动安装到本地仓库： ```bash mvn install:install-file \ -Dfile=langchain4j-bom-1.3.0-beta9.pom \ -DgroupId=dev.langchain4j \ -DartifactId=langchain4j-bom \ -Dversion=1.3.0-beta9 \ -Dpackaging=pom ```
---
### **总结步骤** 1. 先运行 `mvn clean install -U` 2. 检查版本是否存在（可能是拼写错误） 3. 更换镜像源或使用稳定版本 4. 确保 BOM 文件在 `<dependencyManagement>` 中正确声明
如果问题依旧，请提供： - 完整的 `pom.xml` - 执行 `mvn --version` 的输出

这个错误表明 Maven 无法从阿里云镜像仓库 (`alimaven`) 下载 `langchain4j-open-ai-spring-boot-starter:1.3.0` 依赖。以下是详细的解决方案：
---
### **1. 检查版本是否存在** 首先确认该版本是否在 Maven 中央仓库： - 访问 [Maven Central](https://search.maven.org/artifact/dev.langchain4j/langchain4j-open-ai-spring-boot-starter) 搜索该依赖 - 截至2024年7月，最新稳定版本是 `0.9.0`，`1.3.0` 可能不存在或尚未同步到阿里云镜像
---
### **2. 强制更新 Maven 本地缓存** ```bash # 强制重新下载依赖（忽略缓存） mvn clean install -U
# 如果仍失败，手动删除本地缓存 rm -rf ~/.m2/repository/dev/langchain4j/langchain4j-open-ai-spring-boot-starter/ ```
---
### **3. 更换 Maven 镜像源** 阿里云镜像可能未同步该依赖。在 `pom.xml` 或 `settings.xml` 中添加官方仓库： ```xml <!-- 在 pom.xml 中直接添加 --> <repositories> <repository> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/</url> </repository> </repositories> ```
或在 `~/.m2/settings.xml` 中覆盖镜像配置： ```xml <mirrors> <mirror> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/</url> <mirrorOf>central</mirrorOf> </mirror> </mirrors> ```
---
### **4. 使用正确的版本号** 检查 [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/langchain4j/langchain4j/releases) 确认可用版本。例如： ```xml <!-- 使用最新稳定版 --> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-open-ai-spring-boot-starter</artifactId> <version>0.9.0</version> <!-- 替换为实际存在的版本 --> </dependency> ```
---
### **5. 检查依赖作用域** 确保依赖未错误地放在 `<dependencyManagement>` 中： ```xml <!-- 正确位置：直接放在 <dependencies> 下 --> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-open-ai-spring-boot-starter</artifactId> <version>0.9.0</version> </dependency> </dependencies> ```
---
### **6. 手动安装依赖（终极方案）** 如果版本确实存在但无法下载： 1. 从 [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/langchain4j/langchain4j/releases) 下载对应版本的 JAR 和 POM 文件 2. 手动安装到本地仓库： ```bash mvn install:install-file \ -Dfile=langchain4j-open-ai-spring-boot-starter-1.3.0.jar \ -DpomFile=langchain4j-open-ai-spring-boot-starter-1.3.0.pom \ -DgroupId=dev.langchain4j \ -DartifactId=langchain4j-open-ai-spring-boot-starter \ -Dversion=1.3.0 \ -Dpackaging=jar ```
---
### **总结步骤** 1. 先运行 `mvn clean install -U` 强制更新 2. 检查 `1.3.0` 版本是否存在（可能是拼写错误） 3. 更换镜像源或使用稳定版本（如 `0.9.0`） 4. 确保依赖声明位置正确
如果问题依旧，请提供： - 完整的 `pom.xml` - 执行 `mvn --version` 的输出 - 是否使用了 Spring Boot 的 BOM 或父 POM？

option.value:
这个错误表明 Spring Boot 在尝试创建 `openAiChatModel` Bean 时失败了，核心问题是无法实例化 `HttpClientBuilder`，具体是缺少 `dev/langchain4j/http/client/spring/restclient/SpringRestClient` 类。以下是完整的解决方案：
---
### **1. 根本原因分析** 错误链显示： 1. 无法创建 `openAiChatModel` → 2. 因为依赖的 `openAiChatModelHttpClientBuilder` 失败 → 3. 因为 `HttpClientBuilder` 实现类 `SpringRestClient` 找不到
这表明你的项目缺少 LangChain4j 的 HTTP 客户端实现模块。
---
### **2. 解决方案**
#### **方案A：添加缺失的依赖** 在 `pom.xml` 中添加 LangChain4j 的 Spring HTTP 客户端实现： ```xml <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> <!-- 使用与 langchain4j-open-ai 相同的版本 --> </dependency> ```
#### **方案B：检查版本兼容性** 确保所有 LangChain4j 组件版本一致： ```xml <!-- 示例：统一使用 1.0.0 版本 --> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-open-ai-spring-boot-starter</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> </dependency> ```
#### **方案C：使用正确的 BOM 管理版本** ```xml <dependencyManagement> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-bom</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> <type>pom</type> <scope>import</scope> </dependency> </dependencies> </dependencyManagement> ```
---
### **3. 验证依赖树** 运行以下命令检查依赖是否完整： ```bash mvn dependency:tree | grep langchain4j ``` 正常应该看到： ``` [INFO] +- dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-open-ai-spring-boot-starter:jar:1.0.0 [INFO] | \- dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient:jar:1.0.0 ```
---
### **4. 检查自动配置** 确保你的主类有 `@SpringBootApplication` 且包路径正确： ```java @SpringBootApplication public class YourApplication { public static void main(String[] args) { SpringApplication.run(YourApplication.class, args); } } ```
---
### **5. 如果使用自定义配置** 在测试类中显式指定配置： ```java @SpringBootTest(classes = { YourApplication.class, // 主配置类 AutoConfig.class // LangChain4j 自动配置类 }) public class YourTestClass { // ... } ```
---
### **6. 清理和重建** ```bash # 清理缓存 rm -rf ~/.m2/repository/dev/langchain4j/
# 重新构建 mvn clean install -U ```
---
### **常见问题排查表** | 现象 | 解决方案 | |-------|----------| | `ClassNotFoundException: SpringRestClient` | 添加 `langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient` 依赖 | | 版本冲突 | 统一所有 LangChain4j 组件版本 | | 自动配置失败 | 检查主类包路径或显式指定配置类 | | 测试环境问题 | 在测试类中添加 `@Import(AutoConfig.class)` |
如果问题仍未解决，请提供： 1. 完整的 `pom.xml` 2. 主类/测试类的包结构 3. 执行 `mvn dependency:tree` 的输出片段

option.name: content
option.value:
The error you're encountering is a `TimeoutException` when trying to connect to the OpenAI API endpoint (`api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions`). This typically indicates one of the following issues:
### Possible Causes & Solutions:
1. **Network Connectivity Issues** - Your machine may not have a stable internet connection. - **Fix**: Check your network connection, restart your router, or try a different network.
2. **Firewall/Proxy Blocking the Request** - Corporate networks or firewalls may block outgoing requests to OpenAI's API. - **Fix**: Whitelist `api.openai.com` or configure your proxy settings (if applicable).
3. **OpenAI API Downtime** - OpenAI's servers might be temporarily unavailable. - **Fix**: Check [OpenAI's status page](https://status.openai.com/) for outages.
4. **Request Timeout Too Short** - The default timeout in LangChain4J may be too low for your network. - **Fix**: Increase the timeout in your client configuration: ```java OpenAiChatModel model = OpenAiChatModel.builder() .apiKey("your-api-key") .timeout(Duration.ofSeconds(30)) // Increase as needed .build(); ```
5. **DNS Resolution Issues** - Your machine may fail to resolve `api.openai.com`. - **Fix**: Try pinging the domain or flush your DNS cache.
6. **Geographical Restrictions** - OpenAI may be blocked in your region. - **Fix**: Use a VPN or check local regulations.
### Debugging Steps: 1. Test connectivity manually: ```bash curl -v https://api.openai.com ``` (Should return a 404, but confirms connectivity)
2. Verify API keys and endpoint: ```java System.out.println("Testing connectivity..."); ```
3. Enable detailed logging in LangChain4J to see the full request/response cycle.
If the issue persists after trying these steps, share more details about your environment (e.g., are you behind a corporate network? Using a VPN? Any recent changes to your setup?).

option.value: HTTP 401 Unauthorized 错误表示客户端尝试访问受保护的资源但未提供有效的身份验证凭据，或者提供的凭据无效。以下是解决此错误的一些常见原因和解决方法：

option.name: content
option.value: 常见原因

option.name: content
option.value: 1. **缺少认证信息**：请求中未包含必要的认证头（如 `Authorization`）。

option.name: content
option.value: 2. **无效凭证**：提供的用户名/密码、API密钥或令牌不正确或已过期。

option.name: content
option.value: 3. **认证方案不匹配**：服务器期望的认证方式与客户端提供的不一致。

option.name: content
option.value: 4. **跨域问题**：CORS 预检请求失败导致认证信息未被发送。

option.name: content
option.value: 5. **会话过期**：之前有效的会话已超时。

option.name: content
option.value: 解决方案

option.name: content
option.value: 1. **检查认证头**：确保请求包含正确的认证头，例如：

option.name: content
option.value: GET /api/resource HTTP/1.1 Host: example.com Authorization: Bearer your_access_token_here

option.name: content

option.name: content
option.value: 3. **确认认证方案**：服务器可能要求特定的认证方案（Basic, Bearer, Digest 等），确保客户端使用正确的方案。

option.name: content
option.value: 4. **处理 CORS 问题**：如果是前端应用遇到 401，确保正确处理 CORS：

content

option.value:
This error occurs because Maven/Gradle cannot resolve the version number for the `langchain4j-community-dashscope-spring-boot-starter` dependency. Here's how to fix it:
### Solution
1. **Explicitly specify the version** Replace `null` with a valid version from [Maven Central](https://central.sonatype.com/artifact/dev.langchain4j/langchain4j-community-dashscope-spring-boot-starter). Example for Maven (`pom.xml`): ```xml <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-community-dashscope-spring-boot-starter</artifactId> <version>0.25.0</version> <!-- Use latest version --> </dependency> ```
2. **If using Spring Boot's dependency management** Ensure you've imported LangChain4J's BOM (Bill of Materials): ```xml <dependencyManagement> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-bom</artifactId> <version>0.25.0</version> <type>pom</type> <scope>import</scope> </dependency> </dependencies> </dependencyManagement> ```
3. **For Gradle users** ```gradle implementation 'dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-community-dashscope-spring-boot-starter:0.25.0' ```
### Common Causes - Missing version in `pom.xml`/`build.gradle` - Incorrect dependency syntax - Using a snapshot version without proper repository configuration
### Verification After fixing, run: ```bash mvn dependency:tree | grep dashscope # Maven ./gradlew dependencies | grep dashscope # Gradle ``` This should show the resolved version. If issues persist, clean and rebuild your project (`mvn clean install` or `gradle clean build`).

option.name: content
option.value:
This error occurs because Maven cannot find the **LangChain4J Community BOM (Bill of Materials)** version `1.3.0` in **Alibaba's Maven repository (Aliyun)**.
### **Why This Happens** - **Aliyun Maven mirror (`maven.aliyun.com`)** may not have synced the latest LangChain4J artifacts. - **LangChain4J's BOM (`langchain4j-community-bom`)** might not be available in Aliyun (it's primarily hosted in **Maven Central**).
---
### **Solutions**
#### **1. Add Maven Central as a Fallback Repository** Ensure Maven checks **Maven Central** if the artifact is missing in Aliyun. Add this to your `pom.xml`: ```xml <repositories> <repository> <id>aliyun</id> <url>http://maven.aliyun.com/nexus/content/groups/public/</url> </repository> <repository> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/</url> </repository> </repositories> ```
#### **2. Force Maven to Use Central Instead of Aliyun** If Aliyun doesn't have the latest version, skip it temporarily: ```xml <repositories> <repository> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/</url> </repository> </repositories> ```
#### **3. Verify the Correct BOM Dependency** Ensure you're using the right BOM (`langchain4j-bom` instead of `langchain4j-community-bom`). Example: ```xml <dependencyManagement> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-bom</artifactId> <version>0.25.0</version> <!-- Latest stable version --> <type>pom</type> <scope>import</scope> </dependency> </dependencies> </dependencyManagement> ```
#### **4. Clean & Refresh Maven** After updating `pom.xml`, run: ```bash mvn clean install -U ``` (`-U` forces Maven to update dependencies)
---
### **Alternative Fixes** - **Check the latest version** on [Maven Central](https://central.sonatype.com/artifact/dev.langchain4j/langchain4j-bom). - **Use a VPN** if you're in a region where Maven Central is blocked. - **Check corporate proxy settings** if you're behind a firewall.
If the issue persists, share your full `pom.xml` for further debugging.

option.name: content
option.value:
This error message indicates that you're trying to use the WanxImageModel from LangChain4j's DashScope integration, but you're missing some required parameters in your request.
The error specifically states that two fields are required: 1. `function` - This likely refers to the specific image generation function you want to use 2. `base_image_url` - This suggests you're trying to do image-to-image generation and need to provide a source image URL
To fix this issue, you should:
1. Make sure you're properly configuring the WanxImageModel with all required parameters 2. If doing image generation, provide either: - A text prompt for text-to-image generation - Or a base image URL for image-to-image generation
Here's an example of how you might properly configure it:
```java WanxImageModel model = WanxImageModel.builder() .apiKey("your-api-key") .modelName("wanx-v1") // or whatever model you're using .function("text-to-image") // or "image-to-image" .baseImageUrl("https://example.com/image.jpg") // if doing image-to-image .build();
ImageGenerationResponse response = model.generate( new ImageGenerationRequest.Builder() .prompt("a beautiful sunset over mountains") .build() ); ```
If you're doing text-to-image generation, you might not need `base_image_url`, but you would need to specify the function as "text-to-image".

option.value:
This error indicates that there are multiple issues with your DashScope/Wanx image generation setup:
### 1. **Missing API Key Configuration** The `application.properties` file shows `ALIBAILIAN_API_KEY` but it's not properly formatted. It should be: ```properties dashscope.api.key=your_actual_api_key_here ```
### 2. **404 Not Found Error** The 404 error suggests either: - The API endpoint is incorrect - The service you're trying to access doesn't exist - Your API key doesn't have proper permissions
### 3. **Solution Steps**
1. **Fix the API Key Configuration**: Update your `application.properties`: ```properties dashscope.api.key=your_dashscope_api_key_here ```
2. **Verify the WanxImageModel Configuration**: ```java WanxImageModel model = WanxImageModel.builder() .apiKey(System.getenv("dashscope.api.key")) // or load from properties .modelName("wanx-v1") // or the latest model .build(); ```
3. **Check API Endpoint**: Make sure you're using the correct base URL. The default should be fine, but if you need to override: ```java .baseUrl("https://dashscope.aliyuncs.com/api/v1") ```
4. **Verify Service Availability**: - Check if the image generation service is available in your region - Verify your account has proper permissions
5. **Test with a Simple Request**: ```java ImageGenerationResponse response = model.generate( new ImageGenerationRequest.Builder() .prompt("a cat sitting on a laptop") .n(1) // number of images .size("1024x1024") // image size .build() ); ```
If you're still getting 404 errors, you may need to: - Check AliCloud DashScope documentation for any API changes - Verify your account is properly activated for image generation services - Try the API with a simple curl request to isolate the issue

option.value:
这个错误表明 Maven 无法从阿里云镜像仓库 (`alimaven`) 下载 `langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient:1.3.0-beta9` 依赖包。以下是解决方案：
---
### **1. 检查依赖是否存在** 首先确认该版本是否在 Maven 中央仓库存在： - 访问 [Maven Central](https://search.maven.org/) 搜索 `dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient` - 如果 `1.3.0-beta9` 不存在，可能是拼写错误或未发布版本
---
### **2. 强制更新 Maven 本地缓存** ```bash # 强制重新下载依赖（忽略缓存） mvn clean install -U
# 如果仍失败，手动删除本地缓存 rm -rf ~/.m2/repository/dev/langchain4j/ ```
---
### **3. 更换 Maven 镜像源** 在 `pom.xml` 或 `settings.xml` 中添加官方仓库： ```xml <repositories> <repository> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/</url> </repository> </repositories> ```
或修改 `settings.xml`（位于 `~/.m2/settings.xml`）： ```xml <mirrors> <mirror> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/</url> <mirrorOf>central</mirrorOf> </mirror> </mirrors> ```
---
### **4. 使用正确的依赖版本** 如果 `beta9` 不存在，尝试： ```xml <!-- 检查最新版本 --> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient</artifactId> <version>1.3.0</version> <!-- 或最新稳定版 --> </dependency> ```
---
### **5. 检查网络问题** - 确保能访问 Maven 中央仓库： ```bash curl -I https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/ ``` - 如果是公司内网，可能需要配置代理： ```bash export MAVEN_OPTS="-Dhttps.proxyHost=your.proxy.com -Dhttps.proxyPort=8080" ```
---
### **6. 手动安装依赖（终极方案）** 如果依赖确实不在仓库中： 1. 从 [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/langchain4j/langchain4j/releases) 下载 JAR 文件 2. 手动安装到本地仓库： ```bash mvn install:install-file \ -Dfile=langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient-1.3.0-beta9.jar \ -DgroupId=dev.langchain4j \ -DartifactId=langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient \ -Dversion=1.3.0-beta9 \ -Dpackaging=jar ```
---
### **总结步骤** 1. 先运行 `mvn clean install -U` 2. 检查版本是否存在 3. 更换镜像源或使用稳定版本 4. 最后考虑手动安装
如果问题依旧，请提供： - 完整的 `pom.xml` - 执行 `mvn --version` 的输出

这个错误表明 Maven 无法从阿里云镜像仓库 (`alimaven`) 下载 `langchain4j-bom:1.3.0-beta9`（BOM 文件）。以下是详细的解决方案：
---
### **1. 检查版本是否存在** 首先确认该版本是否在 Maven 中央仓库： - 访问 [Maven Central](https://search.maven.org/artifact/dev.langchain4j/langchain4j-bom) 搜索 `langchain4j-bom` - `1.3.0-beta9` 可能是一个**不存在的快照版本**（截至2024年7月，最新稳定版是 `1.0.0`）
---
### **2. 强制更新 Maven 本地缓存** ```bash # 强制重新下载依赖（忽略缓存） mvn clean install -U
# 如果仍失败，手动删除本地缓存 rm -rf ~/.m2/repository/dev/langchain4j/langchain4j-bom/ ```
---
### **3. 更换 Maven 镜像源** 阿里云镜像可能未同步该 BOM 文件。在 `pom.xml` 或 `settings.xml` 中添加官方仓库： ```xml <repositories> <repository> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/</url> </repository> </repositories> ```
或在 `~/.m2/settings.xml` 中覆盖镜像： ```xml <mirrors> <mirror> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/</url> <mirrorOf>central</mirrorOf> </mirror> </mirrors> ```
---
### **4. 使用正确的 BOM 版本** 检查 [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/langchain4j/langchain4j/releases) 确认可用版本。例如： ```xml <!-- 使用稳定版 --> <dependencyManagement> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-bom</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> <!-- 替换为实际版本 --> <type>pom</type> <scope>import</scope> </dependency> </dependencies> </dependencyManagement> ```
---
### **5. 检查依赖声明** 确保 BOM 文件正确导入（需放在 `<dependencyManagement>` 中）： ```xml <project> ... <dependencyManagement> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-bom</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> <type>pom</type> <scope>import</scope> </dependency> </dependencies> </dependencyManagement> <dependencies> <!-- 其他依赖 --> </dependencies> </project> ```
---
### **6. 手动安装 BOM（终极方案）** 如果版本确实存在但无法下载： 1. 从 [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/langchain4j/langchain4j/releases) 下载 BOM 的 `.pom` 文件 2. 手动安装到本地仓库： ```bash mvn install:install-file \ -Dfile=langchain4j-bom-1.3.0-beta9.pom \ -DgroupId=dev.langchain4j \ -DartifactId=langchain4j-bom \ -Dversion=1.3.0-beta9 \ -Dpackaging=pom ```
---
### **总结步骤** 1. 先运行 `mvn clean install -U` 2. 检查版本是否存在（可能是拼写错误） 3. 更换镜像源或使用稳定版本 4. 确保 BOM 文件在 `<dependencyManagement>` 中正确声明
如果问题依旧，请提供： - 完整的 `pom.xml` - 执行 `mvn --version` 的输出

option.name: content
option.value:
这个错误表明 Spring Boot 在尝试创建 `openAiChatModel` Bean 时失败了，核心问题是无法实例化 `HttpClientBuilder`，具体是缺少 `dev/langchain4j/http/client/spring/restclient/SpringRestClient` 类。以下是完整的解决方案：
---
### **1. 根本原因分析** 错误链显示： 1. 无法创建 `openAiChatModel` → 2. 因为依赖的 `openAiChatModelHttpClientBuilder` 失败 → 3. 因为 `HttpClientBuilder` 实现类 `SpringRestClient` 找不到
这表明你的项目缺少 LangChain4j 的 HTTP 客户端实现模块。
---
### **2. 解决方案**
#### **方案A：添加缺失的依赖** 在 `pom.xml` 中添加 LangChain4j 的 Spring HTTP 客户端实现： ```xml <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> <!-- 使用与 langchain4j-open-ai 相同的版本 --> </dependency> ```
#### **方案B：检查版本兼容性** 确保所有 LangChain4j 组件版本一致： ```xml <!-- 示例：统一使用 1.0.0 版本 --> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-open-ai-spring-boot-starter</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> </dependency> ```
#### **方案C：使用正确的 BOM 管理版本** ```xml <dependencyManagement> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-bom</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> <type>pom</type> <scope>import</scope> </dependency> </dependencies> </dependencyManagement> ```
---
### **3. 验证依赖树** 运行以下命令检查依赖是否完整： ```bash mvn dependency:tree | grep langchain4j ``` 正常应该看到： ``` [INFO] +- dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-open-ai-spring-boot-starter:jar:1.0.0 [INFO] | \- dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient:jar:1.0.0 ```
---
### **4. 检查自动配置** 确保你的主类有 `@SpringBootApplication` 且包路径正确： ```java @SpringBootApplication public class YourApplication { public static void main(String[] args) { SpringApplication.run(YourApplication.class, args); } } ```
---
### **5. 如果使用自定义配置** 在测试类中显式指定配置： ```java @SpringBootTest(classes = { YourApplication.class, // 主配置类 AutoConfig.class // LangChain4j 自动配置类 }) public class YourTestClass { // ... } ```
---
### **6. 清理和重建** ```bash # 清理缓存 rm -rf ~/.m2/repository/dev/langchain4j/
# 重新构建 mvn clean install -U ```
---
### **常见问题排查表** | 现象 | 解决方案 | |-------|----------| | `ClassNotFoundException: SpringRestClient` | 添加 `langchain4j-http-client-spring-restclient` 依赖 | | 版本冲突 | 统一所有 LangChain4j 组件版本 | | 自动配置失败 | 检查主类包路径或显式指定配置类 | | 测试环境问题 | 在测试类中添加 `@Import(AutoConfig.class)` |
如果问题仍未解决，请提供： 1. 完整的 `pom.xml` 2. 主类/测试类的包结构 3. 执行 `mvn dependency:tree` 的输出片段

option.name: content
option.value: ``` dev.langchain4j.exception.TimeoutException: I/O error on POST request for "https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions": Connect timed out ```

option.name: content
option.value:
The error you're encountering is a `TimeoutException` when trying to connect to the OpenAI API endpoint (`api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions`). This typically indicates one of the following issues:
### Possible Causes & Solutions:
1. **Network Connectivity Issues** - Your machine may not have a stable internet connection. - **Fix**: Check your network connection, restart your router, or try a different network.
2. **Firewall/Proxy Blocking the Request** - Corporate networks or firewalls may block outgoing requests to OpenAI's API. - **Fix**: Whitelist `api.openai.com` or configure your proxy settings (if applicable).
3. **OpenAI API Downtime** - OpenAI's servers might be temporarily unavailable. - **Fix**: Check [OpenAI's status page](https://status.openai.com/) for outages.
4. **Request Timeout Too Short** - The default timeout in LangChain4J may be too low for your network. - **Fix**: Increase the timeout in your client configuration: ```java OpenAiChatModel model = OpenAiChatModel.builder() .apiKey("your-api-key") .timeout(Duration.ofSeconds(30)) // Increase as needed .build(); ```
5. **DNS Resolution Issues** - Your machine may fail to resolve `api.openai.com`. - **Fix**: Try pinging the domain or flush your DNS cache.
6. **Geographical Restrictions** - OpenAI may be blocked in your region. - **Fix**: Use a VPN or check local regulations.
### Debugging Steps: 1. Test connectivity manually: ```bash curl -v https://api.openai.com ``` (Should return a 404, but confirms connectivity)
2. Verify API keys and endpoint: ```java System.out.println("Testing connectivity..."); ```
3. Enable detailed logging in LangChain4J to see the full request/response cycle.
If the issue persists after trying these steps, share more details about your environment (e.g., are you behind a corporate network? Using a VPN? Any recent changes to your setup?).

option.value: ``` For artifact {dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-community-dashscope-spring-boot-starter:null:jar}: The version cannot be empty. ```

option.name: content
option.value:
This error occurs because Maven/Gradle cannot resolve the version number for the `langchain4j-community-dashscope-spring-boot-starter` dependency. Here's how to fix it:
### Solution
1. **Explicitly specify the version** Replace `null` with a valid version from [Maven Central](https://central.sonatype.com/artifact/dev.langchain4j/langchain4j-community-dashscope-spring-boot-starter). Example for Maven (`pom.xml`): ```xml <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-community-dashscope-spring-boot-starter</artifactId> <version>0.25.0</version> <!-- Use latest version --> </dependency> ```
2. **If using Spring Boot's dependency management** Ensure you've imported LangChain4J's BOM (Bill of Materials): ```xml <dependencyManagement> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-bom</artifactId> <version>0.25.0</version> <type>pom</type> <scope>import</scope> </dependency> </dependencies> </dependencyManagement> ```
3. **For Gradle users** ```gradle implementation 'dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-community-dashscope-spring-boot-starter:0.25.0' ```
### Common Causes - Missing version in `pom.xml`/`build.gradle` - Incorrect dependency syntax - Using a snapshot version without proper repository configuration
### Verification After fixing, run: ```bash mvn dependency:tree | grep dashscope # Maven ./gradlew dependencies | grep dashscope # Gradle ``` This should show the resolved version. If issues persist, clean and rebuild your project (`mvn clean install` or `gradle clean build`).

``` Could not find artifact dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-community-bom:pom:1.3.0 in alimaven (http://maven.aliyun.com/nexus/content/groups/public/)
```

option.name: content
option.value:
This error occurs because Maven cannot find the **LangChain4J Community BOM (Bill of Materials)** version `1.3.0` in **Alibaba's Maven repository (Aliyun)**.
### **Why This Happens** - **Aliyun Maven mirror (`maven.aliyun.com`)** may not have synced the latest LangChain4J artifacts. - **LangChain4J's BOM (`langchain4j-community-bom`)** might not be available in Aliyun (it's primarily hosted in **Maven Central**).
---
### **Solutions**
#### **1. Add Maven Central as a Fallback Repository** Ensure Maven checks **Maven Central** if the artifact is missing in Aliyun. Add this to your `pom.xml`: ```xml <repositories> <repository> <id>aliyun</id> <url>http://maven.aliyun.com/nexus/content/groups/public/</url> </repository> <repository> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/</url> </repository> </repositories> ```
#### **2. Force Maven to Use Central Instead of Aliyun** If Aliyun doesn't have the latest version, skip it temporarily: ```xml <repositories> <repository> <id>central</id> <url>https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/</url> </repository> </repositories> ```
#### **3. Verify the Correct BOM Dependency** Ensure you're using the right BOM (`langchain4j-bom` instead of `langchain4j-community-bom`). Example: ```xml <dependencyManagement> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>dev.langchain4j</groupId> <artifactId>langchain4j-bom</artifactId> <version>0.25.0</version> <!-- Latest stable version --> <type>pom</type> <scope>import</scope> </dependency> </dependencies> </dependencyManagement> ```
#### **4. Clean & Refresh Maven** After updating `pom.xml`, run: ```bash mvn clean install -U ``` (`-U` forces Maven to update dependencies)
---
### **Alternative Fixes** - **Check the latest version** on [Maven Central](https://central.sonatype.com/artifact/dev.langchain4j/langchain4j-bom). - **Use a VPN** if you're in a region where Maven Central is blocked. - **Check corporate proxy settings** if you're behind a firewall.
If the issue persists, share your full `pom.xml` for further debugging.

option.value:
``` teException: [FAILED] InvalidParameter: The following fields are required: function, base_image_url
at dev.langchain4j.community.model.dashscope.WanxImageModel.doGenerate(WanxImageModel.java:119) at dev.langchain4j.community.model.dashscope.WanxImageModel.generate(WanxImageModel.java:91) at shimmer.ai.langchain4j.LLMDemoTest.testDashScopeWanx(LLMDemoTest.java:83) at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:568) at java.base/java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1511) at java.base/java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1511) ```

option.name: content
option.value:
This error message indicates that you're trying to use the WanxImageModel from LangChain4j's DashScope integration, but you're missing some required parameters in your request.
The error specifically states that two fields are required: 1. `function` - This likely refers to the specific image generation function you want to use 2. `base_image_url` - This suggests you're trying to do image-to-image generation and need to provide a source image URL
To fix this issue, you should:
1. Make sure you're properly configuring the WanxImageModel with all required parameters 2. If doing image generation, provide either: - A text prompt for text-to-image generation - Or a base image URL for image-to-image generation
Here's an example of how you might properly configure it:
```java WanxImageModel model = WanxImageModel.builder() .apiKey("your-api-key") .modelName("wanx-v1") // or whatever model you're using .function("text-to-image") // or "image-to-image" .baseImageUrl("https://example.com/image.jpg") // if doing image-to-image .build();
ImageGenerationResponse response = model.generate( new ImageGenerationRequest.Builder() .prompt("a beautiful sunset over mountains") .build() ); ```
If you're doing text-to-image generation, you might not need `base_image_url`, but you would need to specify the function as "text-to-image".

option.name: content
option.value:
This error indicates that there are multiple issues with your DashScope/Wanx image generation setup:
### 1. **Missing API Key Configuration** The `application.properties` file shows `ALIBAILIAN_API_KEY` but it's not properly formatted. It should be: ```properties dashscope.api.key=your_actual_api_key_here ```
### 2. **404 Not Found Error** The 404 error suggests either: - The API endpoint is incorrect - The service you're trying to access doesn't exist - Your API key doesn't have proper permissions
### 3. **Solution Steps**
1. **Fix the API Key Configuration**: Update your `application.properties`: ```properties dashscope.api.key=your_dashscope_api_key_here ```
2. **Verify the WanxImageModel Configuration**: ```java WanxImageModel model = WanxImageModel.builder() .apiKey(System.getenv("dashscope.api.key")) // or load from properties .modelName("wanx-v1") // or the latest model .build(); ```
3. **Check API Endpoint**: Make sure you're using the correct base URL. The default should be fine, but if you need to override: ```java .baseUrl("https://dashscope.aliyuncs.com/api/v1") ```
4. **Verify Service Availability**: - Check if the image generation service is available in your region - Verify your account has proper permissions
5. **Test with a Simple Request**: ```java ImageGenerationResponse response = model.generate( new ImageGenerationRequest.Builder() .prompt("a cat sitting on a laptop") .n(1) // number of images .size("1024x1024") // image size .build() ); ```
If you're still getting 404 errors, you may need to: - Check AliCloud DashScope documentation for any API changes - Verify your account is properly activated for image generation services - Try the API with a simple curl request to isolate the issue
